mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRO WHERE spclty_realm_code LIKE 'SR1%') AS pet, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRO WHERE spclty_realm_code LIKE 'SR2%') AS sport, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRO WHERE spclty_realm_code LIKE 'SR3%') AS music, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRO WHERE spclty_realm_code LIKE 'SR4%') AS home, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRO WHERE spclty_realm_code LIKE 'SR5%') AS hobby, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRO WHERE spclty_realm_code LIKE 'SR6%') AS meet, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRO WHERE spclty_realm_code LIKE 'SR7%') AS gita, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRO) AS total FROM DUAL

select ( select count(*) from SRVC_REQUST where SRVC_REQUST_WR_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE('2024-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2024-01-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) as january, (select count(*) from SRVC_REQUST where SRVC_REQUST_WR_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE('2024-02-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2024-02-29', 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) as february, (select count(*) from SRVC_REQUST where SRVC_REQUST_WR_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE('2024-03-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2024-03-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) as march, (select count(*) from SRVC_REQUST where SRVC_REQUST_WR_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE('2024-04-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2024-04-30', 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) as april, (select count(*) from SRVC_REQUST where SRVC_REQUST_WR_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE('2024-05-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2024-05-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) as may, (select count(*) from SRVC_REQUST where SRVC_REQUST_WR_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE('2024-06-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2024-06-30', 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) as june, (select count(*) from SRVC_REQUST where SRVC_REQUST_WR_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE('2024-07-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2024-07-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) as july, (select count(*) from SRVC_REQUST where SRVC_REQUST_WR_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE('2024-08-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2024-08-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) as august, (select count(*) from SRVC_REQUST where SRVC_REQUST_WR_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE('2024-09-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2024-09-30', 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) as september, (select count(*) from SRVC_REQUST where SRVC_REQUST_WR_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE('2024-10-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2024-10-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) as october, (select count(*) from SRVC_REQUST where SRVC_REQUST_WR_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE('2024-11-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2024-11-30', 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) as november, (select count(*) from SRVC_REQUST where SRVC_REQUST_WR_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE('2024-12-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2024-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) as december, (select count(*) from SRVC_REQUST) as total from dual

select (select count(*) from SRVC_REQUST where SRVC_REQUST_PROCESS_AT = 0 and SRVC_REQUST_WR_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE('2024-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2024-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')) as agree, (select count(*) from SRVC_REQUST where SRVC_REQUST_PROCESS_AT = 1 and SRVC_REQUST_WR_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE('2024-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2024-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')) as refusal, (select count(*) from SRVC_REQUST) as total from dual
